metadata.description: Asset-specific average settlement times by route category for fallback estimates
metadata.calculation_method: Asset-specific weighted averages based on sample sizes from existing data
metadata.note: Asset-specific data is preferred over these category averages. Use these only when no asset-specific data is available.
